A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Plot holes galore\, little action\, breaks cannon and makes the other movies almost shattered because of a \"newly found force ability\"\, severely unrealistic plot even with the plot armor Star Wars is notorious for\, and the entire movie was a bigger set up for the next than Batman Vs Superman was a set up for Justice League\, let's just hope 9 isn't as big of a let down as Justice League was...
